original_title: 万引き少女…何発ヤッても帰してくれないしつこい追姦ピストンレ×プの悲劇。
overview: Aizawa Minami is a schoolgirl who got caught shoplifting. The store manager brings her to the backroom, where instead of reporting her to the police, decides to use his leverage to rape her.  After he is done, she is found crying by an office worker who saves her, at least initially, until he decides to rape her too.  Tough day.
title: A Shoplifting Girl… A Tragedy Of A Persistent Rape Pistoning Rep Who Won’t Let her go Home No Matter How Many Times he cums – Minami Aizawa
